verses.verse: I am sought <S%H1875><s%> of them that asked <S%H7592><s%> not for me; I am found <S%H4672><s%> of them that sought <S%H1245><s%> me not: I said, <S%H559><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> me, behold <S%H2009><s%> me, to a nation <S%H1471><s%> that was not called <S%H7121><s%> by my name. <S%H8034><s%>

I have spread <S%H6566><s%> out my hands <S%H3027><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> to a rebellious <S%H5637><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> which walks <S%H1980><s%> in a way <S%H1870><s%> that was not good, <S%H2896><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their own thoughts; <S%H4284><s%>

A people <S%H5971><s%> that provokes me to anger <S%H3707><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> to my face; <S%H6440><s%> that sacrifices <S%H2076><s%> in gardens, <S%H1593><s%> and burns <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> on altars of brick; <S%H3843><s%>

Which remain <S%H3427><s%> among the graves, <S%H6913><s%> and lodge <S%H3885><s%> in the monuments, <S%H5341><s%> which eat <S%H398><s%> swine's <S%H2386><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and broth <S%H6564><s%> of abominable <S%H6292><s%> things is in their vessels; <S%H3627><s%>

Which say, <S%H559><s%> Stand <S%H7126><s%> by yourself, come <S%H5066><s%> not near <S%H5066><s%> to me; for I am holier <S%H6942><s%> than you. These <S%H428><s%> are a smoke <S%H6227><s%> in my nose, <S%H639><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> that burns <S%H3344><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day. <S%H3117><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is written <S%H3789><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me: I will not keep silence, <S%H2814><s%> but will recompense, <S%H7999><s%> even recompense <S%H7999><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> their bosom, <S%H2436><s%>

Your iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> and the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have burned <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and blasphemed <S%H2778><s%> me on the hills: <S%H1389><s%> therefore will I measure <S%H4058><s%> their former <S%H7223><s%> work <S%H6468><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> their bosom. <S%H2436><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> As the new <S%H8492><s%> wine <S%H8492><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%> in the cluster, <S%H811><s%> and one said, <S%H559><s%> Destroy <S%H7843><s%> it not; for a blessing <S%H1293><s%> is in it: so <S%H3651><s%> will I do <S%H6213><s%> for my servants' <S%H5650><s%> sakes, <S%H4616><s%> that I may not destroy <S%H7843><s%> them all. <S%H3605><s%>

And I will bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> a seed <S%H2233><s%> out of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and out of Judah <S%H3063><s%> an inheritor <S%H3423><s%> of my mountains: <S%H2022><s%> and my elect <S%H972><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> it, and my servants <S%H5650><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And Sharon <S%H8289><s%> shall be a fold <S%H5116><s%> of flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor <S%H5911><s%> a place for the herds <S%H1241><s%> to lie <S%H7258><s%> down <S%H7257><s%> in, for my people <S%H5971><s%> that have sought <S%H1875><s%> me.

But you are they that forsake <S%H5800><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that forget <S%H7913><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> that prepare <S%H6186><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> for that troop, <S%H1409><s%> and that furnish <S%H4390><s%> the drink <S%H4469><s%> offering to that number. <S%H4507><s%>

Therefore will I number <S%H4487><s%> you to the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and you shall all <S%H3605><s%> bow <S%H3766><s%> down <S%H3766><s%> to the slaughter: <S%H2874><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> when I called, <S%H7121><s%> you did not answer; <S%H6030><s%> when I spoke, <S%H1696><s%> you did not hear; <S%H8085><s%> but did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> before my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> choose <S%H977><s%> that wherein <S%H834><s%> I delighted <S%H2654><s%> not.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> shall eat, <S%H398><s%> but you shall be hungry: <S%H7456><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> shall drink, <S%H8354><s%> but you shall be thirsty: <S%H6770><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> shall rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> but you shall be ashamed: <S%H954><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> shall sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H2898><s%> of heart, <S%H3820><s%> but you shall cry <S%H6817><s%> for sorrow <S%H3511><s%> of heart, <S%H3820><s%> and shall howl <S%H3213><s%> for vexation <S%H7667><s%> of spirit. <S%H7307><s%>

And you shall leave <S%H5117><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> for a curse <S%H7621><s%> to my chosen: <S%H972><s%> for the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> shall slay <S%H4191><s%> you, and call <S%H7121><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> by another <S%H312><s%> name: <S%H8034><s%>

That he who <S%H834><s%> blesses <S%H1288><s%> himself in the earth <S%H776><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> himself in the God <S%H430><s%> of truth; <S%H543><s%> and he that swears <S%H7650><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> shall swear <S%H7650><s%> by the God <S%H430><s%> of truth; <S%H543><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> troubles <S%H6869><s%> are forgotten, <S%H7911><s%> and because <S%H3588><s%> they are hid <S%H5641><s%> from my eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

For, behold, <S%H2005><s%> I create <S%H1254><s%> new <S%H2319><s%> heavens <S%H8064><s%> and a new <S%H2319><s%> earth: <S%H776><s%> and the former <S%H7223><s%> shall not be remembered, <S%H2142><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> mind. <S%H3820><s%>

But be you glad <S%H7797><s%> and rejoice <S%H1523><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%> in that which <S%H834><s%> I create: <S%H1254><s%> for, behold, <S%H2005><s%> I create <S%H1254><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a rejoicing, <S%H1525><s%> and her people <S%H5971><s%> a joy. <S%H4885><s%>

And I will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and joy <S%H7797><s%> in my people: <S%H5971><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of weeping <S%H1065><s%> shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> in her, nor the voice <S%H6963><s%> of crying. <S%H2201><s%>

There shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> an infant <S%H5764><s%> of days, <S%H3117><s%> nor an old <S%H2205><s%> man that has not filled <S%H4390><s%> his days: <S%H3117><s%> for the child <S%H5288><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old; <S%H1121><s%> but the sinner <S%H2398><s%> being an hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shall be accursed. <S%H7043><s%>

And they shall build <S%H1129><s%> houses, <S%H1004><s%> and inhabit <S%H3427><s%> them; and they shall plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of them.

They shall not build, <S%H1129><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> inhabit; <S%H3427><s%> they shall not plant, <S%H5193><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> eat: <S%H398><s%> for as the days <S%H3117><s%> of a tree <S%H6086><s%> are the days <S%H3117><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> and my elect <S%H972><s%> shall long enjoy <S%H1086><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of their hands. <S%H3027><s%>

They shall not labor <S%H3021><s%> in vain, <S%H7385><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> bring <S%H3205><s%> forth <S%H3205><s%> for trouble; <S%H928><s%> for they are the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and their offspring <S%H6631><s%> with them.

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that before <S%H2962><s%> they call, <S%H7121><s%> I will answer; <S%H6030><s%> and while they are yet <S%H5750><s%> speaking, <S%H1696><s%> I will hear. <S%H8085><s%>

The wolf <S%H2061><s%> and the lamb <S%H2924><s%> shall feed <S%H7462><s%> together, <S%H259><s%> and the lion <S%H738><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> like the bullock: <S%H1241><s%> and dust <S%H6083><s%> shall be the serpent's <S%H5175><s%> meat. <S%H3899><s%> They shall not hurt <S%H7489><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> destroy <S%H7843><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
